Comment_glosser: toho means ‘one’ and arĩ ‘two’ according to contributor
I believe this form is a mistake as it is identical to 5 and the contributor states that 4 is “arĩ sharĩ (literally ‘two-two’)”.
This could theoretically also be 2⋅2 but based on the other numerals, e.g., 6, addition is more likely.
